Description.Text:
Feel welcomed by distinguished comfort and an ideal location on the shores of the Sea of Marmar. Sheraton Istanbul Atakoy is positioned immediately alongside Atakoy Marina and the sea bus terminal, and just 8 minutes from Ataturk Airport. Just 10 minutes from Sultanahmetth, the cultural and tourism highlight of Istanbul, and 20 minutes from historic Taksim Square, we offer easy access to the area's most popular attractions. Plus, we're a short stroll to major shopping malls such as Galleria, Carousel, Capacity, and Town Center, and offer convenient transportation options to major centers and fairgrounds including the Istanbul Performance Center, CNR and TUYAP.
Bright and spacious, our 285 guest rooms and suites offer a personal and inviting atmosphere and modern conveniences. Kick back and relax in our famously comfortable Sheraton Sweet Sleeper Bed, and take in the sweeping marina and sea views. Make time for yourself at our indoor and outdoor pools, sauna, jacuzzi, Turkish bath, gym, running track, tennis courts, and fitness facility or treat yourself to a massage at our onsite spa. Stay connected to friends, business, and family in our Link Sheraton with Microsoft, complete with High Speed Internet Access.
Find inspiration in our beautiful meeting facilities. Our two sunlit ballrooms and 9 conference rooms all have a gorgeous view of the hotel's spacious garden and the sea. Whether you're planning a business meeting for 10, or a catered gala dinner for up to 2000 guests, we have everything you need to plan a successful and memorable event.
Savour the pleasures of Turkish and international gastronomy enhanced by attentive, warm service in our two restaurants, which offer both buffet and a la carte options. Enjoy libations at our full service bar, or visit our Executive Lounge, where you can sip a cocktail while enjoying panoramic views of the sea and marina.
We've thought of the little (and big) things that will make your stay a memorable one. Our information desk and room service operates 24 hours, and a hairdresser, florist, souvenir shop and photographer are also available should you need them. Additionally, we provide complimentary transportation to and from the airport and city center.
We look forward to making you feel comfortable and connected while you explore the local sights, take care of important business, or spend time with the ones you love at Sheraton Istanbul Atakoy.
